welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Mandza, Comoros! Get ready to be enchanted by our beautiful city known for its stunning beaches, vibrant culture, and delicious cuisine. We invite you to explore and experience all that Mandza has to offer."

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal of Iconi Airport where all domestic and international flights are handled.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal of Iconi Airport where all freight and cargo flights are handled.

wifi.note: Free wifi is available throughout the airport.
